articles.author: Yaron Steinbuch
articles.title: 3-year-old American girl crawled from under murdered dad's body before she was taken hostage by Hamas - New York Post
articles.description: A 3-year-old American girl who is being held in Gaza was reportedly in her father’s arms when he and her mom were killed by Hamas terrorists – and managed to crawl out from under his body before sh…
